text:
Communication is
very interesting because this is growing up and have a global power on our
influence in 2022. When social media, TV or radio appear communication knows his
power increase. I think this domain is a future place to help the development
of a firm and can be bigger because he is the first stage of the discovering or
of giver a desire about something.
We can determined
the work behind the commercial which need research, brain storming, there is a team
who is working on it and this boost my decision on that way. Because I like to work
in team this give a better vision on the work we wants to show.
But the work is
not necessary visual his most powerful influence is on it but we can have
commercial sound like SNCF and the voice of the woman. With this we can recognize
the firm and give to him a identity.
In Paris there is
a Fast food who is very good and powerful because he knows the main mentality and
adapt his purpose of his commercial to have more impact on it. Then people see
him like more cool and prefer take a thing in their company because they know
how to demark against the other company. Then thanks to his team of communication
the company have more and more people who appreciate the company identity then his
offer.
This is why I take
that way for my future studies, In my opinion the communication is a good way
to show what we can do.
